cloud: AWS: Fargate, Lambda, ECS, DynamoDB, CloudWatch

experience.role: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
experience.description:
Created and developed testing pipelines in Azure.
Enhanced the testing process by developing PowerShell scripts for seamless installation and modification of test dependencies, including the setup of local components.
Drafted and maintained web-based automated tests using WebDriverIO, Jasmine, and Javascript.

Automated API tests in Python for a data pipeline service using PyTest and Jenkins pipelines.
Led load testing effort using AWS Fargate and the Locust testing platform.
Assumed the role of Scrum Master to implement Agile practices and increase development productivity. Led Scrum ceremony meetings and organized sprint planning and implementation efforts.

Pioneered the drafting and development of over thirty L2 and L3 automated tests for SmartLicensing client and server testing using C# and VS Test.
Automated server web application tests using Selenium and SpecFlow frameworks.
Implemented new automated tests and corresponding test plans in a pipeline framework using Azure DevOps.
Led and established a collaboration environment for over 60 SDETs throughout Hexagon PPM. Held monthly information sessions to share automation processes.

education.college: The University of Alabama in Huntsville

projects.name: The Domino Effect
projects.description:
Developed an iOS application using Xcode and Swift that allows users to select a list of domino pieces and sort them to find the most efficient “path” for a game of dominos.
Implemented custom branch and bound algorithm to sort the user’s list of dominos most efficiently to yield the most points in a round.
